title: macdak
author: macdak
content: One day little pepe dreamed of a certain deity in the form of DOGE and told him that he would be the keeper of the keys to the EarthThe most original memecoin in existence, a rattling mixture of pepe built on Dogecoin Chain (DRC-20)About:Pepe Cardinals - believes in a bright future, actively uses all the benefits of the 21st century:- cryptocurrency- social networks- love to listen to music- worships Dogecoin- waits for Elon Musk to send it to MarsSocial media:website - http://pepecardinals.com/Twitter - https://twitter.com/pepedrc20Telegtam chat - https://t.me/pepedrc20Telegram chanel - https://t.me/pepedrcReddit - https://www.reddit.com/r/pepedrc20Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/pepedrc20

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: When will people leave poor PEPE alone and stop trying to make a hype out of its name? In the last 2 weeks I saw a huge amount of different clones and tokens based on PEPE. All these trinkets don't have anything good in themselves, I don't recommend anyone to buy such tokens, if you want to part with your money, give them to charity. It will be much more effective than buying such trash tokens.

comments.author: macdak
comments.body: Hi. constructive criticism is good! We will have a completely different short name, not "pepe"we're keeping it a secret for now

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: And now here comes another narrative. We've got BRC20 and now it's DRC20, I wonder if it will ever cause some havoc as well on the Doge network. Was it required to have the PEPE name on new narratives or likely these developers can't think of a name? And, look at that last statement waiting for Elon. Guys it's 2023.

comments.author: macdak
comments.body: We are here for the long haul üê∏

comments.author: timoshani
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on May 22, 2023, 03:06:29 PMWhen will people leave poor PEPE alone and stop trying to make a hype out of its name? In the last 2 weeks I saw a huge amount of different clones and tokens based on PEPE. All these trinkets don't have anything good in themselves, I don't recommend anyone to buy such tokens, if you want to part with your money, give them to charity. It will be much more effective than buying such trash tokens.I absolutely agree. This topic is already littering so much that interest drops sharply. You begin to understand that PEPE is generally some kind of soap bubble. No idea, no tokenomics, no roadmap. Just a means of quick profit. For a couple of weeks, the topic will be in the TOP, and then fade away.

comments.author: macdak
comments.body: you say that because you missed the train that left without you. PEPE on ethereum is the top 3 memecoin by capitalization - he will not go anywhere and we are just getting started, let's see what happens next

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: macdak on May 23, 2023, 04:47:12 AMyou say that because you missed the train that left without you. PEPE on ethereum is the top 3 memecoin by capitalization - he will not go anywhere and we are just getting started, let's see what happens nextExactly, the train has already left the station, so what is the point of trying to get into this high-risk investment sector now? The golden rule of investing is to invest when no one knows about it, not the other way around. Now history is repeating itself, like with SHIB. After everyone knew about it, thousands of clones of this coin began to appear on the market. But none of the clones could repeat the success of SHIB. And what happens to SHIB now? The same will happen to PEPE and its clones.

comments.author: macdak
comments.body: We are making a living character with his own stories, it's not just another memecoin
